function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Optimization of pcr conditions may result in false-positive results.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Accumulation of extraneous nucleic acids during the concentration process of wastewater samples.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Untested retention of wastewater samples before the sars-cov-2 pandemic as control.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Possible cross contamination during the purification or rna isolation step","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unspecific signal in rt-qpcr due to environmental contaminants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential false-positive results due to environmental contaminants affecting pcr","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of pcr targeting sars-cov-2 rdrp and m-gene in wastewater analysis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral outgrowth assay using caco-2 cells for detecting sars-cov-2 infection in wastewater samples.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison of rt-qpcr primer and probe efficiency for detecting sars-cov-2 genes in wastewater.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Analysis of bioindicators in wastewater to estimate population can lead to inaccurate assessments and decision-making.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Testing sample materials during a pandemic carries the risk of incomplete or inaccurate detection of contagious viruses such as sars-cov-2.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on pcr assays targeting specific genes for sars-cov-2 detection in wastewater may result in limited virus detection and surveillance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher gene equivalent concentrations in the effluent than the influent due to repartitioning of gene material during wastewater treatment.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral rna is not eliminated in the treated wastewater, indicating potential presence of contagious viruses.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to detect infectious sars-cov-2 particles in the treated sewage despite the presence of viral rna fragments.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive identification of human sars-cov-2 by means of rt-qpcr","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher sars-cov-2 rna copy number in solid-phase reservoir of wastewater samples","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2-specific rna in untreated and treated wastewater samples","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in pcr measurements and storage conditions for rna extraction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disturbing factors accumulated during sample processing that could influence analysis results","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Estimation of covid-19 cases based on sewer network connections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The use of filtration equipment may not effectively remove all contaminants, including contagious disease particles.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate quantification of endogenous parameters like creatinine and urea could lead to incorrect assessments of water quality and potential health risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The prevalence of reported covid-19 cases in the wwtp catchment area may indicate a higher risk of potential contamination in the water supply.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to wastewater samples during analysis","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of mass spectrometric equipment and analysis","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handling and manipulation of chemical reagents and solvents","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Isolation and use of hcov-229e in pcr","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sanger sequencing analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Replication studies with sars-cov-2 positive wastewater","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of specific pcr conditions for detecting viruses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Handling and manipulation of viral rna samples","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Verification of specificity and sensitivity of rna sequencing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Handling and processing of contaminated wastewater samples may pose a risk of exposure to infectious viral rna.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analysis of wastewater samples could potentially expose individuals to infectious viral material.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in testing procedures and analysis methods for detecting coronavirus genetic material in environmental samples","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of understanding about the correlation between wastewater-based analysis and acute infection cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the distribution and survival of sars-cov-2 in the aquatic environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential transmission of sars-cov-2 via feces in wastewater","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate estimation of infection spread in a population","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delayed detection of non-detected covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Restrictions on levels of crowding on public transport","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Fewer office workers in the city","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased sanitation requirements","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Monitoring people for high temperatures or signs of illness","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Difficulty in maintaining the supply of vital food and medicine due to panic buying and disrupted supply chains.","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High concentration of people in cities limiting the ability to travel to alternative sources of supply.","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Risk of hospitals reaching capacity and frontline medical personnel facing scarcity of resources and access to necessary items.","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Detailed personal location data could be misused for tracking individuals without their consent, leading to privacy violations.","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased surveillance and tracking of individuals may lead to a sense of intrusion and loss of personal freedom.","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"}]}
